atomic_tests.name: System Network Connections Discovery
atomic_tests.description:
Get a listing of network connections.

Upon successful execution, cmd.exe will execute `netstat`, `net use` and `net sessions`. Results will output via stdout.

atomic_tests.name: System Network Connections Discovery with PowerShell
atomic_tests.description:
Get a listing of network connections.

Upon successful execution, powershell.exe will execute `get-NetTCPConnection`. Results will output via stdout.

atomic_tests.name: System Network Connections Discovery FreeBSD, Linux & MacOS
atomic_tests.description:
Get a listing of network connections.

Upon successful execution, sh will execute `netstat` and `who -a`. Results will output via stdout.

dependencies.description: Check if netstat command exists on the machine
dependencies.prereq_command: if [ -x "$(command -v netstat)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
dependencies.get_prereq_command: echo "Install netstat on the machine."; exit 1;

atomic_tests.name: System Discovery using SharpView
atomic_tests.description:
Get a listing of network connections, domains, domain users, and etc.  
sharpview.exe located in the bin folder, an opensource red-team tool.
Upon successful execution, cmd.exe will execute sharpview.exe <method>. Results will output via stdout.

SharpView.description: Path of the executable opensource redteam tool used for the performing this atomic.

syntax.description: Arguements method used along with SharpView to get listing of network connections, domains, domain users, and etc.

dependencies.description: Sharpview.exe must exist on disk at specified location (#{SharpView})
